articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.title: Samsung Confirms Latest Free Offers For Galaxy S24 Ultra - Forbes
articles.description: Samsung has some very special offers for those buying the new Galaxy S24, S24+, and S24 Ultra smartphones.
articles.content:
Updated February 1: article originally posted January 31.
Following an impressive reveal and popular pre-order window, Samsung's Galaxy S24 smartphones go on sale to the public today. And for those … [+4423 chars]

articles.title: Stable isotopes show Homo sapiens dispersed into cold steppes ~45,000 years ago at Ilsenhöhle in Ranis, Germany - Nature.com
articles.description: The authors present palaeoclimatic data in the form of stable isotope records from equid teeth spanning 12,500 years of human occupation at the site of Ilsenhöhle in Ranis, Germany, including the earliest occupation of the site by Homo sapiens ~45,000 years a…

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.
